bs-socialarticleactions-entityactionarti:
Headline for a "articlesave" entry. Should link to owners user page [[User:$1|User:$1]] and the page, that was edited [[:$6|:$6]]
* $1 - Username of the owner of this entry
* $2 - Real name of the owner of this entry
* $3 - Main part of title of the source page, this entry is saved in as json data
* $4 - Namespace number of the source page, this entry is saved in as json data
* $5 - Namespace name of the source page, this entry is saved in as json data
* $6 - Prefixed full title of the page that was edited
* $7 - Main part of page that was edited
* $8 - Namespace number of the page, that was edited
* $9 - Namespace name of the page, that was edited

Headline for a "articlecreate" entry. Should link to owners user page [[User:$1|User:$1]] and the page, that was created [[:$6|:$6]]
* $1 - Username of the owner of this entry
* $2 - Real name of the owner of this entry
* $3 - Main part of title of the source page, this entry is saved in as json data
* $4 - Namespace number of the source page, this entry is saved in as json data
* $5 - Namespace name of the source page, this entry is saved in as json data
* $6 - Prefixed full title of the page that was created
* $7 - Main part of page that was created
* $8 - Namespace number of the page, that was created
* $9 - Namespace name of the page, that was created

Headline for a "articledelete" entry. Should link to owners user page [[User:$1|User:$1]] and the page, that was deleted [[:$6|:$6]]
* $1 - Username of the owner of this entry
* $2 - Real name of the owner of this entry
* $3 - Main part of title of the source page, this entry is saved in as json data
* $4 - Namespace number of the source page, this entry is saved in as json data
* $5 - Namespace name of the source page, this entry is saved in as json data
* $6 - Prefixed full title of the page that was deleted
* $7 - Main part of page that was deleted
* $8 - Namespace number of the page, that was deleted
* $9 - Namespace name of the page, that was deleted

bs-socialarticleactions-autoeditsummaray: Text that gets displayed instead of the edit summary, when it was left empty
